漏洞标题: Microsoft Office远程代码执行漏洞（CNVD-2024-49214）
影响产品:
Microsoft SharePoint Enterprise Server 2016 <16.0.5478.1000
Microsoft SharePoint Enterprise Server 2016 >16.0.0
Microsoft  SharePoint Server 2019 <16.0.10416.20026
Microsoft  SharePoint Server 2019 >16.0.0
Microsoft  Office 2019 <https://aka.ms/OfficeSecurityReleases
Microsoft  Office 2019 >19.0.0
Microsoft  365 Apps for Enterprise <https://aka.ms/OfficeSecurityReleases
Microsoft  365 Apps for Enterprise >16.0.1
Microsoft  Office LTSC for Mac 2021 <16.92.24120731
Microsoft  Office LTSC for Mac 2021 >16.0.1
Microsoft  Office LTSC 2021 <https://aka.ms/OfficeSecurityReleases
Microsoft  Office LTSC 2021 >16.0.1
Microsoft  Office LTSC 2024 <https://aka.ms/OfficeSecurityReleases
Microsoft  Office LTSC 2024 >1.0.0
Microsoft  Office LTSC for Mac 2024 <16.92.24120731
Microsoft  Office LTSC for Mac 2024 >1.0.0
Microsoft  Word 2016 <16.0.5478.1000
Microsoft  Word 2016 >16.0.1
漏洞描述:
Microsoft Office是Microsoft(微软)公司开发的一套办公软件套装，常用组件有Word、Excel、PowerPoint等。
Microsoft Office存在远程代码执行漏洞，攻击者可利用该漏洞在目标主机上执行代码。
漏洞解决方案:
目前厂商已经发布了升级补丁以修复这个安全问题，请到厂商的主页下载：
https://portal.msrc.microsoft.com/en-US/security-guidance/advisory/CVE-2024-49065
